subject: Stadiums and Arenas
Television
Football
lead_paragraph: In football, the best seat in the house may be in the living room, not at the game. Now sports officials are trying to bring the screen to the stadium, not the other way around.
snippet: In football, the best seat in the house may be in the living room, not at the game. Now sports officials are trying to bring the screen to the stadium, not the other way around.
